verbs.description: another weekend of [V: dreaded] [ARG1: parkway east restrictions] is coming this weekend parkway east work will result in traffic restrictions in both directions between edgewood - swissvale and oakland inbound one of the three lanes of traffic will be closed between the squirrel hill tunnel and oakland from 9 p m friday through 11 p m sunday outbound traffic will be reduced to a single lane between the bates street on - ramp and edgewood - swissvale from 9 p m friday to 5 a m monday crews will do milling and paving pg publishing co pennsylvania oakland squirrel hill tunnel
